contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 23, 1899 D Thornsett Contest
Thornsett Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
thornsett-contest
None
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Thornsett, Derbyshire Promoted by Thornsett Prize Band. 1st prize £10, 2nd prize £7, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3, 5th prize £1. March contest 1st (£1) Mossley, 2nd (10s.) Glodwick. Result as shown p43 "The Contest Field" October 1899. Page 41 of same publication showing adjudicators remarks has W.Rimmer conducting Biddulph! 6 bands competed
April 19, 2012, 6:18 p.m. July 28, 2019, 4:26 p.m.
1 Lees & Glodwick James Holloway
2 Mossley Band Alexander Owen
3 New Mills Band Fred Durham
4 Biddulph Richard Bailey
5 Pendleton Old William Rimmer
Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band James Holloway
